sources.title: The Devil and Miss Sarah
sources.description: Title: The Devil and Miss Sarah Summary: A notorious outlaw being escorted to prison by a homesteader and his wife turns out to have satanic powers. He uses them on the man's wife to try to possess her and help him escape. Directed by: Michael Caffey Actors: Gene Barry, Janice Rule, James Drury Production Company: Universal Television Release Date: TV Movie 4 December 1971 Aspect Ratio: 1.33 : 1 A notorious outlaw being escorted to prison by a homesteader and his wife turns out to have satanic powers. He uses them on the man's wife to try to possess her and help him escape.

metadata.Plot: A notorious outlaw being escorted to prison by a homesteader and his wife turns out to have satanic powers. He uses them on the man's wife to try to possess her and help him escape.
